name: Coconut Lime Soup
description: You don’t normally think of hot soup as refreshing, but this one ticks that box! It’s tangy, a little creamy, and filled with nutrient-packed veggies & healthy beans.

ingredients.name: cannellini beans
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or white beans of your choice

ingredients.name: Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning or Chicken Fried Rice Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot set over high heat, add broth and cover.
Meanwhile, dice pepper and sweet potato. Drain and rinse beans.
To pot, add pepper, sweet potato, beans, seasoning, and coconut milk. Cover, bring to a simmer, and let cook for 10 min, or until sweet potatoes are tender.
Remove pot from heat. Stir in spinach, one cup at a time, until wilted. Using 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice from lime.
Ladle into bowls; serve with diced cucumber on top.
tips: Try prepared Nourish or Vegetable Broth for a tasty, sodium conscious base for this soup.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Salad Dressing, your choice.
